Federal Cleanup Support for Ohio Train Derailment

Overview: Executive Order 14096 directs federal agencies to support cleanup and recovery efforts in East Palestine, Ohio following the February 2023 train derailment. The primary goal is to assist the local community in the aftermath of the incident.

Bottom Line: This order has no direct impact on higher education institutions.

Key Impacts on Higher Education:

Affected Departments:

Action Plan:

Action Required: No. The order focuses on cleanup efforts in a specific community and does not contain any requirements for colleges and universities.

Short-term Actions (1-3 months):

Long-term Considerations:

Resource Requirements:

Personnel: None

External Expertise: None
